recipe.name: Marinated Short Ribs
recipe.notes: A truly lovely typed card from a clear card pro.
recipe.preparation: Mix together ingredients and shake well.If you like a lot of marinade, double or even triple this amount.Wipe meat with damp cloth and put into a deep bowl.  Pour marinade over the meat and wedge a few thick slices of onion between the pieces of beef.  Cover and keep in a cool place for 8 to 24 hours, stirring occasionally.Remove the ribs from the sauce and brown it [sic].  Then add marinade and onions to meat, cover and bake in a moderate oven for one hour.  Remove cover and bake until onions are brown and the fat is crisp.Serve with baked potatoes and barbecue sauce or gravy made from the drippings.
